TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Equatorial_Guinea, title = Equatorial_Guinea, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Equatorial_Guinea} }

S.FORM: = Equatorial Guinea = Gaga kska Meycow ka Equatorial guinea, 2 00 N, 10 00 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 28,051 sq km(hangan na o Tg146)(knlbanga dxgal o 28,051 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 0 sq km). Kana ka sejiqun o niqan 759,451 hiyi. Gaga Malabo ka pusu alang paru, jiyax 12 idas 10 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Manu ka dxgal Equatorial guinea ga wada sugan 10.10% ka dxgal qpahan, 57.50% ka dxgal bbuyu, rahuq dxgal do niqan 32.40% na. Bukung klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Teodoro Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, pnaah hngkawas1979 idas 8 jiyax 3pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Cutaw Cineyya Konghokwo, lxan rmngaw pa Cutaw Cineyya(kari Sipanya: Guinea Ecuatorial；kari Hwaransi:Guinée équatoriale；kari Budoya:Guiné Equatorial) lxan kari Cyokoku pa Cuci, wa mniq ckcka Ahuyrika, koka sediq Ahuyrika bsiyaq balay knou bay pndkanan nngalan sntkuwan. Knhbrawan hiyi sediq kngkawas 2019 u 93 kbkiyan 5983 knhbrawan hiyi. Ana so niqan Cutaw sunca ka hangan koka u, binaw balay bay mnuda dxral nniqan ucilung nanaq ka dhiya, ini ka kasi uda mdayak lmihu dxral koka dha. Rikisi Duma Cutaw Cineyya taru ka tnpusu mnniq hiya u sediq Pikomi, wada yahan mddayak mluk sediq Pantu ka dxral dha. kngkawas 1471 dhuq kngkawas 1472, tnpucilung Budoya Fernão do Pó ka miying elu ucilung susa Indu cida u wada sndiyal Hweynadopotaw, wada sndhu hangan sunca"Formosa". Annopntaw u mniq burah kngkawan sndalan kiya, kiya ka so niyi mangal hangan. Kngkawas 1499, spuda"Pnsdhu kari Totesiriyasu", wa mniq iril cing 50tu tuiril dxral u subway Sipanya, tunarac dxral u subway Budoya, sediq Budoya pa kndadax cida mangal nniqan dxral Asia mi Ahuyrika, Nanmeyco u to bay nSipanya kiya. Dhuq knrana ka mbbari quli cida, sediq Budoya ka wada pstuq biyax pusu pnyahan mi cuko. Kiya niyi ka snrdingan Sipanya, Sipanya u meysa mniq Ahuyrika nniqan mbari quli uri. Kngkawas 1778, smruwa muway Sipanya duma tawyu ssiyaw ucilung Ahuyrika ka Budoya, kiya mi ckcka taru mniq yayung Okwowey(wa mniq Cyapong konghokwo saya) mi dxral iyax yayung Niju, spuda niyi ka ngalan dha ppriyux kari, sediq Budoya ka iril cing 50tu tuiril mangal biyax nniqan Meyco(tuiril Pasi saya) u wada srwanan Sipanya. Mntna kngkawas wada mtmay Formosa ka Sipanya, wada dha pryuxun tmhangan Hweynadopotaw, muda kndamac sediq sndiyal. Binaw, alaw ka mrana ka narux mcayis kntilux, wada snpusal ini kndungus ka sediq Sipanya knthdil taw hini, wada malix mi mlatac taw niyi da. Babaw mtdiyal ka ckcka Sipanya daw, nSipanya Cineyya u wada mangal knou bay qpahun smmlun. Kngkawas 1959, wada ngalun Hweynandopo mi Muniho ddha haywaysng. Kngkawas 1964 idas 1, wada mangalckcka cucu ka ddha sng niyi. Dhq kngkawas 1968, mniq minjoku dukuricu undo mi ryeynhokwo ddha biyax knchdilan niyi, wada srwanan muway dukuricu dhiya ka Sipanya. Kngkawas 1968 idas 10 diyax 12, nSipanya Cineyya pa psdhu kari dukuricu, knpriyux hangan koka sa Cutaw Cineyya Konghokwo. Nniqan Knkana ddxral Cutaw Cineyya pa 28,051 pinghwang kongri, kingal u ngalan nniqan Muniho("nniqan Mupini"), wa mniq Ahuyrika, ya bay so knbbaraw tunarac tuiril, mi duril tuhunac tudaya tubbaraw hniwan, msqapah Komayrong mi Cyapong, msridil mquri nniqan Muniho. Nniqan hiya u Pata ka pusu alang beyhing. Tudha u wa mniq tuiril daya mi ckcka Cineyyawan Piawkotaw(cuminti cida u thnganan Hweynandopotaw, Fernando Póo), sotu Cutaw Cineyya Marapo pa kiya ka wa mniq tudaya Piawkotaw. Kiya mi wa mniq tuiril hunac 598 kongri mi miyah Annopntaw(Annobón). Singcng cyuhwa Cutaw Cineyya singcng cyuhwa ici ka tacyu, arci ka sng. Kana koka pa psakan dha tacyu, mpitu ka sng(provincias): Haytaw tacyu Annopn sng(Annobón) Peypeyawko sng(Bioko Norte) Nanpeyawko sng(Bioko Sur) Taru tacyu Congnan sng(Centro Sur) Ciayentomu sng(Kie-Ntem) Pinhay sng(Litoral) Weyrayensasu sng(Wele-Nzas) Keyjay Cutaw Cineyya ka tuhunac Sahara Ahuyrika kayhwa cong koka, pphuma pnwalang ka pusu nngalan keyjay dha, pusu bay cuko dha pnwalang u koko, tudha daw kahuy. Koka niyi u bsiyaq balay pniqan hangan kana mtqiri knlangan babaw dxral ini hari kayhwa, binaw kngkawas 1996 mniq Cutaw Cineyya sndiyal knou bay ngengalan gasoring, kndadax hiya cida wada ini biyaw mrata ka keyjay dha, kngkawas 1997 dhuq kngkawas 2001 pnsdkaun keyjay knrana pa dhuq 41.7%. Beytaq kngkawas 2004, wada mthunac Sahara Ahuyrika tuturu knbeyhing bay pnyahan gasoring kaka ka Cutaw Cineyya, knkingal diyax pa dhuq 36 beyki ngaba gasoring. Kngkawas 2001-2008 ka knrana GDP Cutaw Cineyya u dhuq 20%, knrbangan nengyeyn pumn ka dmkuh knrana niyi. Cuko gasoring kngkawas 2009 pa wada dhuq 99% ka nngalang kana. Spun mita ka knkrana keyjay nxan u musa kndudul knmalu. Alaw wada mlih 40％ ka cuko, pnrdingan dknttu ou hbangan na u mnbalay wada knpriyux msciyuk, GDP na u knkana kngkawas 2009 na ya bay 20%. Ana tura bay mdurin ka nngalan hbangan knttu mbanah bntasan, spun mita musa dhuq mlih dhuq 5% ka GDP kngkawas 2010, binaw spun mita kngkawas 2011-12 u muda mntxan knrbangan dungan. Wada tkkla lmngelung kasi bay knou klwanan keyjay ka seyhu, wada hmrinas quri cicu cyeynso ka tocu, nduray niyi ka wisu mrana ssmlun. Kngkkawas niyi, mniq tucka iril Ahuyrika to bay so mstabuy ka keyjay cida u uda murux mdhu keyjay na ka Cutaw Cineyya, lmutuc 10 kngkawas ka mdhu hmrinas 26% ka spidaw bay mrana. Smdiyal gasoring mi kmari u wada kasi txan mrana bay ka keyjay koka Cutaw Cineyya, mduwi biyax mi tubaraw hnyuwan sediq pa wada tura bay mkala ka nngalan dha hbangan, nngalan hbangan knhbrawan balay sediq u wada mrana hari, wada knmalu hari ka kndusan nniqan dha. Kngkawas 2007 mnuda mssli tudha knkana koka jeyjay taykay, muda muda pprngaw sngtangal kngkawas 2008-2020 pkrana keyjay koka mi syakay, mniq kntbyaxan pkrana qpahun gasoring cida, knkana prading cyawtong mi tongsyun mi deyngki mi weysong ka cicu sosu smmlun, krmanun pkrana ka qpahun pnrwalang mi cyakong ka uuqun snalu qqcurux mi mmusa rmiwaw mi qpahun quri cinjong, dmudul pkrana knou kluwanan keyjay. Kngkawas 2017 tumal pnsliyan koka pnyahan gasoring. Kiya mi ana so knou bay GDP dha mniq sediq koka Ahuyrika Cutaw Cineyya, pdkanan mniq kana mtqiri knlangan babaw dxral u tu56. Binaw quri so knkrana keyjay dha pa ini bay pnsbalay. Wana ini bay knhbaraw sediq niqan knkla dhuq mangal knmalu. Mniq ryeynhokwo ka kngkawas 2015 ppkla knkranan ssediq u, Cutaw Cineyya ka tu135. Ini khrinas dmka knhbrawan sediq ka niqan qsiya mahun, 20% ka llaqi u 5 kngkawas daw wada mrdang da. Quri so murux pskuraw ka seyhu pa mniq knkingal biyax sediq mi kntrawah meyti cupyaw u kngkawas u mniq"thiti bay"ka hangan dha. Seyji Kngkawas 1968 babaw dukuricu ka Cutaw Cineyya daw, ida tnsapah Nguema ka muda lmutuc nanaq llutuc dha pskuraw dmuwi biyax qmlahang. Kngkawas 1968 idas 10, Francisco Macías Nguema ka wada mwaya bay soto Cutaw Cineyya. Kngkawas 1970 , wada pusa kari ka koka Cutaw Cineyya qrapun kana ka cngtang uxay dmuwi biyax qmnlahang. Kngkawas 1972, Nguema ka pusa kari hiya nanaq ka"msoto beytaq nhdanan knudus", kiya mi muda murux pskuraw qmlahang. Kngkawas 1979 idas 8, laqi tnswayi Nguema, "koka kemin jnmin ucwang biyax bu" hukubucyo Toawtoro Awpiang Nguema Mupasoko ka dmudul butayi pspaux, phiyu knbeyhing bay butayi ingkay, wada qrapun mi phqilun ka Nguema. Kngkawas 1982 wada malix qnlhangan butayi ka Cutaw Cineyya, Awpiang ka phyuwan soto, lmutuc dmuwi waya murux cngtang, dhuq balay kngkawas 1990 ka knpriyux dmuwi waya hbaraw cngtang. Mniq kngkawas 1989 mi kngkawas 1996 mi kngkawas 2009 mnturu mangal soto ka Awpiang. Trahuc na u phiyu Conggiying 100 hiyi Sanggiying 75 hiyi, Cutaw Cineyya pa niqan ndanan mtqiri knlangan babaw dxral, bsiyaq bay ngalan soto. Niqan nina Kngkawas 1974, mpatas Ingkoku Horeyriko Hosaysu mniq patas bnatas na "The Dogs of War"cka hiya, dmuwi Cutaw Cineyya ka pusu spatas na, nsung na matas ka koka Cankoro Ahuyrika, snrnu mpdudul Ingkoku kwangyey lmawa Oco pnsliyan kuyongping dmudul pspaux seyhu, pnngalan kari quri kndadax hiya muda dmuwi biyax mangal king bhuway cuyeyn. Pnkla 22 kngkawas ka patas niyi daw, balay bay smdiyal mndungus bay cuyeyn(gasoring) ka Cutaw Cineyya. Kngkawas 2004, ingkoku cyeyn kuyongping Simon Mann ka iyux bay kndadax tuhunac Ahuyrika lmawa kuyongcyun muda pspaux seyhu, peyyah quli bukung priyux Awpiang, kndadax hiya muda qmlahang gasoring cuyeyn koka niyi. Binaw uuda dha pspaux seyhu u wada ini pndungus. Ndanan niyi pa so sklwiun mntna bay patas bnatas "The Dogs of War"uri. Laqi na sosyang cuxan Ingkoku Cayciar hujn Mako Cayciar ka tyuwan dha dnayaw hbangan muda pprngaw pspaux seyhu ka hiya uri, Ingkoku kokay ging mi mpatas patas Cyeyhori Aco uri ka wada hliyan psumu hbangan pspaux seyhu. Simon Mann pa alaw jikeyng niyi wada phmuk sapah kung dhuq kngkawas 2009 "alaw quri qqlahang biyax sediq"wada plaxun.

= Eqoatorial Goinea = Gaga kska Meycow ka Eqoatorial goinea, 2 00 N, 10 00 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 28,051 sq km(hangan na o Tg146)(knlbanga dxgal o 28,051 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 0 sq km). Kana ka sejiqon o niqan 759,451 hiyi. Gaga Malabo ka poso alang paro, jiyax 12 idas 10 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Mano ka dxgal Eqoatorial goinea ga wada sogan 10.10% ka dxgal qpahan, 57.50% ka dxgal bboyo, rahoq dxgal do niqan 32.40% na. Bokong klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Teodoro Obiang Ngoema Mbasogo, pnaah hngkawas1979 idas 8 jiyax 3pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Cotaw Cineyya Konghokwo, lxan rmngaw pa Cotaw Cineyya(kari Sipanya: Goinea Ecoatorial；kari Hwaransi:Goinée éqoatoriale；kari Bodoya:Goiné Eqoatorial) lxan kari Cyokoko pa Coci, wa mniq ckcka Ahoyrika, koka sediq Ahoyrika bsiyaq balay knoo bay pndkanan nngalan sntkowan. Knhbrawan hiyi sediq kngkawas 2019 o 93 kbkiyan 5983 knhbrawan hiyi. Ana so niqan Cotaw sonca ka hangan koka o, binaw balay bay mnoda dxral nniqan ocilong nanaq ka dhiya, ini ka kasi oda mdayak lmiho dxral koka dha. Rikisi Doma Cotaw Cineyya taro ka tnposo mnniq hiya o sediq Pikomi, wada yahan mddayak mlok sediq Panto ka dxral dha. kngkawas 1471 dhoq kngkawas 1472, tnpocilong Bodoya Fernão do Pó ka miying elo ocilong sosa Indo cida o wada sndiyal Hweynadopotaw, wada sndho hangan sonca"Formosa". Annopntaw o mniq borah kngkawan sndalan kiya, kiya ka so niyi mangal hangan. Kngkawas 1499, spoda"Pnsdho kari Totesiriyaso", wa mniq iril cing 50to toiril dxral o sobway Sipanya, tonarac dxral o sobway Bodoya, sediq Bodoya pa kndadax cida mangal nniqan dxral Asia mi Ahoyrika, Nanmeyco o to bay nSipanya kiya. Dhoq knrana ka mbbari qoli cida, sediq Bodoya ka wada pstoq biyax poso pnyahan mi coko. Kiya niyi ka snrdingan Sipanya, Sipanya o meysa mniq Ahoyrika nniqan mbari qoli ori. Kngkawas 1778, smrowa moway Sipanya doma tawyo ssiyaw ocilong Ahoyrika ka Bodoya, kiya mi ckcka taro mniq yayong Okwowey(wa mniq Cyapong konghokwo saya) mi dxral iyax yayong Nijo, spoda niyi ka ngalan dha ppriyox kari, sediq Bodoya ka iril cing 50to toiril mangal biyax nniqan Meyco(toiril Pasi saya) o wada srwanan Sipanya. Mntna kngkawas wada mtmay Formosa ka Sipanya, wada dha pryoxon tmhangan Hweynadopotaw, moda kndamac sediq sndiyal. Binaw, alaw ka mrana ka narox mcayis kntilox, wada snposal ini kndongos ka sediq Sipanya knthdil taw hini, wada malix mi mlatac taw niyi da. Babaw mtdiyal ka ckcka Sipanya daw, nSipanya Cineyya o wada mangal knoo bay qpahon smmlon. Kngkawas 1959, wada ngalon Hweynandopo mi Moniho ddha haywaysng. Kngkawas 1964 idas 1, wada mangalckcka coco ka ddha sng niyi. Dhq kngkawas 1968, mniq minjoko dokorico ondo mi ryeynhokwo ddha biyax knchdilan niyi, wada srwanan moway dokorico dhiya ka Sipanya. Kngkawas 1968 idas 10 diyax 12, nSipanya Cineyya pa psdho kari dokorico, knpriyox hangan koka sa Cotaw Cineyya Konghokwo. Nniqan Knkana ddxral Cotaw Cineyya pa 28,051 pinghwang kongri, kingal o ngalan nniqan Moniho("nniqan Mopini"), wa mniq Ahoyrika, ya bay so knbbaraw tonarac toiril, mi doril tohonac todaya tobbaraw hniwan, msqapah Komayrong mi Cyapong, msridil mqori nniqan Moniho. Nniqan hiya o Pata ka poso alang beyhing. Todha o wa mniq toiril daya mi ckcka Cineyyawan Piawkotaw(cominti cida o thnganan Hweynandopotaw, Fernando Póo), soto Cotaw Cineyya Marapo pa kiya ka wa mniq todaya Piawkotaw. Kiya mi wa mniq toiril honac 598 kongri mi miyah Annopntaw(Annobón). Singcng cyohwa Cotaw Cineyya singcng cyohwa ici ka tacyo, arci ka sng. Kana koka pa psakan dha tacyo, mpito ka sng(provincias): Haytaw tacyo Annopn sng(Annobón) Peypeyawko sng(Bioko Norte) Nanpeyawko sng(Bioko Sor) Taro tacyo Congnan sng(Centro Sor) Ciayentomo sng(Kie-Ntem) Pinhay sng(Litoral) Weyrayensaso sng(Wele-Nzas) Keyjay Cotaw Cineyya ka tohonac Sahara Ahoyrika kayhwa cong koka, pphoma pnwalang ka poso nngalan keyjay dha, poso bay coko dha pnwalang o koko, todha daw kahoy. Koka niyi o bsiyaq balay pniqan hangan kana mtqiri knlangan babaw dxral ini hari kayhwa, binaw kngkawas 1996 mniq Cotaw Cineyya sndiyal knoo bay ngengalan gasoring, kndadax hiya cida wada ini biyaw mrata ka keyjay dha, kngkawas 1997 dhoq kngkawas 2001 pnsdkaon keyjay knrana pa dhoq 41.7%. Beytaq kngkawas 2004, wada mthonac Sahara Ahoyrika totoro knbeyhing bay pnyahan gasoring kaka ka Cotaw Cineyya, knkingal diyax pa dhoq 36 beyki ngaba gasoring. Kngkawas 2001-2008 ka knrana GDP Cotaw Cineyya o dhoq 20%, knrbangan nengyeyn pomn ka dmkoh knrana niyi. Coko gasoring kngkawas 2009 pa wada dhoq 99% ka nngalang kana. Spon mita ka knkrana keyjay nxan o mosa kndodol knmalo. Alaw wada mlih 40％ ka coko, pnrdingan dkntto oo hbangan na o mnbalay wada knpriyox msciyok, GDP na o knkana kngkawas 2009 na ya bay 20%. Ana tora bay mdorin ka nngalan hbangan kntto mbanah bntasan, spon mita mosa dhoq mlih dhoq 5% ka GDP kngkawas 2010, binaw spon mita kngkawas 2011-12 o moda mntxan knrbangan dongan. Wada tkkla lmngelong kasi bay knoo klwanan keyjay ka seyho, wada hmrinas qori cico cyeynso ka toco, ndoray niyi ka wiso mrana ssmlon. Kngkkawas niyi, mniq tocka iril Ahoyrika to bay so mstaboy ka keyjay cida o oda morox mdho keyjay na ka Cotaw Cineyya, lmotoc 10 kngkawas ka mdho hmrinas 26% ka spidaw bay mrana. Smdiyal gasoring mi kmari o wada kasi txan mrana bay ka keyjay koka Cotaw Cineyya, mdowi biyax mi tobaraw hnyowan sediq pa wada tora bay mkala ka nngalan dha hbangan, nngalan hbangan knhbrawan balay sediq o wada mrana hari, wada knmalo hari ka kndosan nniqan dha. Kngkawas 2007 mnoda mssli todha knkana koka jeyjay taykay, moda moda pprngaw sngtangal kngkawas 2008-2020 pkrana keyjay koka mi syakay, mniq kntbyaxan pkrana qpahon gasoring cida, knkana prading cyawtong mi tongsyon mi deyngki mi weysong ka cico soso smmlon, krmanon pkrana ka qpahon pnrwalang mi cyakong ka ooqon snalo qqcorox mi mmosa rmiwaw mi qpahon qori cinjong, dmodol pkrana knoo klowanan keyjay. Kngkawas 2017 tomal pnsliyan koka pnyahan gasoring. Kiya mi ana so knoo bay GDP dha mniq sediq koka Ahoyrika Cotaw Cineyya, pdkanan mniq kana mtqiri knlangan babaw dxral o to56. Binaw qori so knkrana keyjay dha pa ini bay pnsbalay. Wana ini bay knhbaraw sediq niqan knkla dhoq mangal knmalo. Mniq ryeynhokwo ka kngkawas 2015 ppkla knkranan ssediq o, Cotaw Cineyya ka to135. Ini khrinas dmka knhbrawan sediq ka niqan qsiya mahon, 20% ka llaqi o 5 kngkawas daw wada mrdang da. Qori so morox pskoraw ka seyho pa mniq knkingal biyax sediq mi kntrawah meyti copyaw o kngkawas o mniq"thiti bay"ka hangan dha. Seyji Kngkawas 1968 babaw dokorico ka Cotaw Cineyya daw, ida tnsapah Ngoema ka moda lmotoc nanaq llotoc dha pskoraw dmowi biyax qmlahang. Kngkawas 1968 idas 10, Francisco Macías Ngoema ka wada mwaya bay soto Cotaw Cineyya. Kngkawas 1970 , wada posa kari ka koka Cotaw Cineyya qrapon kana ka cngtang oxay dmowi biyax qmnlahang. Kngkawas 1972, Ngoema ka posa kari hiya nanaq ka"msoto beytaq nhdanan knodos", kiya mi moda morox pskoraw qmlahang. Kngkawas 1979 idas 8, laqi tnswayi Ngoema, "koka kemin jnmin ocwang biyax bo" hokobocyo Toawtoro Awpiang Ngoema Mopasoko ka dmodol botayi pspaox, phiyo knbeyhing bay botayi ingkay, wada qrapon mi phqilon ka Ngoema. Kngkawas 1982 wada malix qnlhangan botayi ka Cotaw Cineyya, Awpiang ka phyowan soto, lmotoc dmowi waya morox cngtang, dhoq balay kngkawas 1990 ka knpriyox dmowi waya hbaraw cngtang. Mniq kngkawas 1989 mi kngkawas 1996 mi kngkawas 2009 mntoro mangal soto ka Awpiang. Trahoc na o phiyo Conggiying 100 hiyi Sanggiying 75 hiyi, Cotaw Cineyya pa niqan ndanan mtqiri knlangan babaw dxral, bsiyaq bay ngalan soto. Niqan nina Kngkawas 1974, mpatas Ingkoko Horeyriko Hosayso mniq patas bnatas na "The Dogs of War"cka hiya, dmowi Cotaw Cineyya ka poso spatas na, nsong na matas ka koka Cankoro Ahoyrika, snrno mpdodol Ingkoko kwangyey lmawa Oco pnsliyan koyongping dmodol pspaox seyho, pnngalan kari qori kndadax hiya moda dmowi biyax mangal king bhoway coyeyn. Pnkla 22 kngkawas ka patas niyi daw, balay bay smdiyal mndongos bay coyeyn(gasoring) ka Cotaw Cineyya. Kngkawas 2004, ingkoko cyeyn koyongping Simon Mann ka iyox bay kndadax tohonac Ahoyrika lmawa koyongcyon moda pspaox seyho, peyyah qoli bokong priyox Awpiang, kndadax hiya moda qmlahang gasoring coyeyn koka niyi. Binaw ooda dha pspaox seyho o wada ini pndongos. Ndanan niyi pa so sklwion mntna bay patas bnatas "The Dogs of War"ori. Laqi na sosyang coxan Ingkoko Cayciar hojn Mako Cayciar ka tyowan dha dnayaw hbangan moda pprngaw pspaox seyho ka hiya ori, Ingkoko kokay ging mi mpatas patas Cyeyhori Aco ori ka wada hliyan psomo hbangan pspaox seyho. Simon Mann pa alaw jikeyng niyi wada phmok sapah kong dhoq kngkawas 2009 "alaw qori qqlahang biyax sediq"wada plaxon.
